All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddEventCompleteActivity
Activity that appears as the completion screen when creating an event.
AddEventQROptionsActivity
Activity for the QR code options when creating an event A AppCompatActivity subclass.
Admin
A class representing an admin
AdminActivity
The AdminActivity class is the activity that is used to display the admin interface.
AdminActivityTest
Espresso Tests for the admin activity
AdminEventsFragment
Fragment of the Admin page, listing all of the events of the app's database
AdminHomeFragment
Fragment displaying the Admins main menu screen, from where other subpages can be accessed A Fragment subclass.
AdminImagesFragment
Fragment of the Admin page, displaying all the images of the app's database
AdminPhoto
A class to represent a photo
AdminProfilesFragment
Fragment of the Admin page, listing all the profiles of the app's database
Attendee
A class representing an attendee
AttendeeActivity
The AttendeeActivity class is the main activity for the Attendee user type.
AttendeeActivityTest
Espresso tests for the attendee activity
AttendeeAnnouncementsActivity
This class represents the activity for the attendee announcements page.
AttendeeArrayAdapter
An adapter that connects a ListView of Attendees with an ArrayList of Attendees.
AttendeeArrayAdapter.Format
 
AttendeeCheckInCounter
A class to represent the number of times an attendee has checked into an event.
AttendeeEventInfoActivity
An activity displaying the information about an event.
AttendeeEventListFragment
A simple Fragment subclass.
AttendeeProfileFragment
A Fragment subclass.
AttendeeUnitTest
Tests for the Attendee class
AttendeeValidator
Class to validate an attendee
AttendeeValidatorUnitTest
Unit tests for the AttendeeValidator
BriefEventArrayAdapter
Class for adapting an event name to an item in the BriefEvent list on the organizer dashboard
CheckInConfettiActivity
Activity that appears after a check-in that shows confetti
ConfirmDeleteFragment
DialogFragment that shows a popup to confirm the user wants to delete a specific document from the firestore database
Database
A class to represent the database
DatePickerFragment
Fragment for selecting date A DialogFragment subclass.
DatePickerFragment.DatePickerDialogListener
Interface to be implemented by parent activity/fragment
Event
Class to represent an Event
EventAdminArrayAdapter
An adapter that connects a ListView of events with an ArrayList of events specifically in the Admin's "Events" section A EventArrayAdapter object is used to display a list of events in a ListView.
EventArrayAdapter
An adapter that connects a ListView of events with an ArrayList of events.
EventAttendeeArrayAdapter
An adapter that connects a ListView of attendees and their check-in counts to an event with an ArrayList of the attendees and their check-in counts.
EventInfoActivityTemplate
A template AppCompatActivity for event info pages.
EventItemManager
A class to provide services when initializing/updating event items in listviews.
EventListFragmentTemplate
A template Fragment for event lists.
EventManager
A class to provide services when interacting with events in the app, such as signing-in events.
EventMilestoneArrayAdapter
An adapter that connects a ListView of event Milestones with an ArrayList of event milestone integers.
EventTimeComparator
Comparator that compares two event based on if they are happening right now
EventTimeComparatorUnitTest
Unit tests for the EventTimeComparator
EventUnitTest
Unit tests for the Event class
EventValidator
Class to validate an event
EventValidatorUnitTest
Unit tests for the EventValidator class
GoToEventListener
Interface for a class that listens to GoToEvent requests
HashHelper
Class with methods to help with string hashing.
ImageCarouselAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for the ImageCarousel on the MainActivity
ImageCarouselAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder for the RecyclerView adapter
ListType
Enumerator for different types of lists
LocationPickerActivity
Activity for picking a location on a map when making events
MainActivity
The main activity of the application.
MainActivityTest
Espresso tests for the main activity
Milestone
Class to represent a milestone
MilestoneUnitTest
Tests for the Milestone class.
Notification
The Notification class is used to create notifications that can be displayed to the user.
NotificationArrayAdapter
An adapter that connects a ListView of notifications with an ArrayList of notifications.
Organizer
A class representing an organizer
OrganizerActivity
Class the represents organizer functions with bottom navigation bar A AppCompatActivity subclass that represents the organizer's activity
OrganizerActivityTest
Espresso Tests for the Organizer Activity
OrganizerCreateEventFragment
A simple Fragment subclass.
OrganizerEditEventActivity
Activity for organizer to edit event Allows organizer to edit event attributes Allows organizer to upload event poster A AppCompatActivity subclass.
OrganizerEventAttendeeListActivity
The OrganizerEventAttendeeListActivity class displays the list of attendees for an event.
OrganizerEventInfoActivity
The OrganizerEventInfoActivity class displays the information about an event for the organizer.
OrganizerEventListFragment
A Fragment subclass.
OrganizerEventMapActivity
The OrganizerEventMapActivity class displays the map of an event for the organizer and check in locations.
OrganizerEventMilestonesActivity
The OrganizerEventMilestonesActivity class displays the milestones for an event for the organizer.
OrganizerEventNotificationsActivity
The OrganizerEventNotificationsActivity class allows event organizers to send locations for their event.
OrganizerProfileFragment
Fragment displayed when viewing profile for an organizer
OrganizerUnitTest
Unit tests for the organizer class
OrganizerValidator
Class to validate organizer objects
OrganizerValidatorUnitTest
Unit tests for the OrganizerValidator class
PhotoArrayAdapter
An adapter that connects a GridView of Photos with an ArrayList of Photos.
ProfilePhotoGenerator
A class to generate a default profile picture for an attendee
PushNotificationService
The PushNotificationService class is used to send notifications to attendees of an event.
QRCode
Class to represent a QR code
QRCodeUnitTest
Tests for the QRCode class.
QrScanFragment
A simple Fragment subclass.
QRType
Enumerator for different QR code types
ShareHelper
Helper class that extends FileProvider to help with sharing images.
TimePickerFragment
Fragment for time picker Allows user to select time Passes selected time to parent activity/fragment A DialogFragment subclass.
TimePickerFragment.TimePickerDialogListener
Interface to be implemented by parent activity/fragment
